result.execSummary:
The defendant John R. Kregenow was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: John R. Kregenow
parties.address: 1402 E Royalton Street, c/o Waupaca County Jail, Waupaca, WI 54981

parties.name: Waupaca County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: Be in compliance with probation sentences in 14CF152 and 14CF174

Defendant shall not possess or consume any alcoholic beverages unless Agent approves in writing.
Defendant shall not possess any dangerous weapons.
Defendant shall have no contact directly or indirectly with Jennifer Thomsen or Lori Chesnut.
Defendant prohibited from going on any premises or within 4 blocks where they may be present or defendant has reason to believe they may be present.

Defendant to pay supervision fees as determined by DOC.
Provide biological specimen to State Crime Lab for DNA analysis.
Defendant shall submit to any assessments and fully participate in any counseling deemed appropriate by the Agent and abide by any treatment recommendations.
Defendant shall possess prescription medication only by valid prescription and take in the manner and method as prescribed by physician.
Defendant may not terminate any prescriptions or counseling unless provider approves in writing.
Within 2 weeks of release from current sentence, schedule a mental health assessment and provide verification to Agent.
Credit for 8 days, if probation is revoked.

timeConds.notes: Defendant shall provide verified documentation to Agent.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
